attributes.review: This app has some many orange glitches like the orange Cheeto man that calls himself president but anyways when you open the app it says that they will personally stalk and always ask for your location in my opinion I don’t think you should download this app😙.
attributes.title: 𝑊ℎ𝑎𝑡 𝑖𝑠 𝑡ℎ𝑖𝑠 ℎ𝑜𝑛𝑒𝑦

attributes.review: As soon as I installed this app, so of course pay respect to the Lord and Savior, President Trump, my phone got so slow!! It drains my battery, conflicts with other apps and causes ads to pop up everywhere! It deleted several of my pictures and even other apps!! Do not install!!
attributes.title: DO NOT INSTALL

attributes.review: There was this weird feature in the app where when I opened it, these disgusting pictures of some person dressed up as a Cheeto popped up asking me to sign some petition🤢🤮. If you do not want to experience this glitch, rate the app a one star so they fix it.
attributes.title: Very Awful

attributes.review:
IT HACKED MY PHONE 
a sad cheeto man 🦧started apearing in my gallery, then in my wallpapers WeiRd 🚼He started farting and eating tacos🌮🌮 for no apparent reason.🚼 Then my phone started talking in different languages and sending me a message every minute, they said VOTE VOTE VOTE but not for ME. So i guess we should follow its instructions💫🧚🏻‍♂️ANYWAYS horrible app don't recommend ciao! 🦖🦕
attributes.title: SAD CHEETO MAN APP

attributes.review: As a good American citizen, I was horrified by this app. It’s inappropriate content, messages, and notifications were beyond awful, and are not fit to be on a social platform, let alone be our presidential representation! Absolutely horrible, this app is a rancid representation of our wonderful nation and the American dream
attributes.title: Absolutely horrendous

attributes.review: i really wanted to support my lord and savior donald j trump by downloading his app but let me tell you... THE WHOLE THING IS JUST CHEETO PORN. all of it. idk who thought it was funny to give such misleading advertising but when it says 17+ on the app store it wasn’t kidding. beware.
attributes.title: i wish i could go back to when i didn’t download this app

attributes.review: I originally downloaded this app because I heard this is where you apply to be a sugar baby for daddy Trump✨. So I was like say less 😜. Get that bread, get that head, then leave. 💞💸BUT then I realized I was at the wrong place. As soon as I downloaded the app my skin started turning orange. 🍊If I could rate it 0/5 stars I would.
attributes.title: Mr. Rapist/Racist/Ugly/Lying/Cheeto/Ignorant

attributes.review: not a good app , didn’t keep me updated with the information . even if it wasn’t good but could not recommend if I could have put a 0 i probably would have not . because i am not mean but yeh get at your own risk , wouldn’t recommend.
attributes.title: Sucked

attributes.review: This is not a good thing this app should have never been created politics and people running for office should not be allowed to creat an app. Trumps app asks for personal information that should not be asking for but yet he’s trying to get tiktok band for the same thing.
attributes.title: No just no

attributes.review: Right when i opened this app, i received a text message to my phone from the app saying that to fulfill a subscription i had to give my social security number?? absolutely an invasion of privacy and of my american rights. IF YOU VALUE YOUR AMERICAN CITIZEN RIGHTS DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP !! it is probably a fake put up by russians to steal our information!!!! WARN EVERYONE.
attributes.title: UNAMERICAN AND RUSSIAN HACKERS INVOLVED!!!!
